Pre-Game Insights: India are expected to maintain their current combination, with Mohammed Siraj remaining on the bench.
Bangladesh's batting lineup, particularly Tanzid Hasan, is under pressure to perform against a strong Indian attack.
There is a historical edge to this rivalry, with past incidents such as the 2015 World Cup no-ball call and the 2016 T20 World Cup drama adding significance to the match.
Others: The match will take place on June 22, 2024, at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium in North Sound, Antigua.
